summary: Barry drives his parents to the airport, then tunes a rich woman's piano. He gets her cheating husband's Porsche. The husband's body's in the trunk. Then there's the fraternity's extreme initiation ritual. Will he get his dream girl?
cast: Corey Haim|Evan Richards|Jeremy Slate|Randall England|Tracy Fraim|Brittney Lewis|James MacKrell|Suzanne Kent|Susan Seaforth Hayes|Brynja McGrady|Don Shanks|Sam Shamshak|Julie Simper|Billy Judkins|Kipp Shiotani|Susan Dolan Stevens|Darrin Wheaton|Gary Winterholler|Bill Glasmann|Lance C. Williams|John Naulin
keywords: cult movie|strong female character|porsche|two word title|chase
title: Un coche y un fiambre
